    public class RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirectionTerran_VultureMicro
extends RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirection
    RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirectionTerran_VultureMicro.java --- Improved RetreatAction for a Terran_Vulture that allows a kiting of enemy Units using the Terran_Vulture micro that utilizes the patrol command.
    Author:
    P H - 30.09.2017
